drug.name: ABT-288
drug.description: ABT-288 is under investigation in clinical trial NCT01018875 (Efficacy and Safety Study of ABT-288 in Subjects With Mild-to-Moderate Alzheimer's Disease).

drug-interaction.name: Benzylpenicilloyl polylysine
drug-interaction.description: ABT-288 may decrease effectiveness of Benzylpenicilloyl polylysine as a diagnostic agent.

drug-interaction.name: Betahistine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Betahistine can be decreased when used in combination with ABT-288.

drug-interaction.name: Hyaluronidase (ovine)
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Hyaluronidase (ovine) can be decreased when used in combination with ABT-288.

drug-interaction.name: Amphetamine
drug-interaction.description: Amphetamine may decrease the sedative and stimulatory activities of ABT-288.

drug-interaction.name: Phentermine
drug-interaction.description: Phentermine may decrease the sedative and stimulatory activities of ABT-288.

drug-interaction.name: Pseudoephedrine
drug-interaction.description: Pseudoephedrine may decrease the sedative and stimulatory activities of ABT-288.
